data.title: Bank of America Plaza (LA) – Garage
data.meta_description: Reserve cheap parking for Bank of America Plaza here. Visit today to browse the lowest parking rates for Bank of America Plaza and surrounding LA locations!
data.text:
Reserve Parking for Bank of America Plaza

With ParkABM & ParkChirp, you can reserve affordable parking for Bank of America Plaza! Continue reading below for more information. You can also get started right away by clicking “Buy Hourly Parking”.

The Bank of America Plaza garage is operated by ABM. The tower itself is a beautiful landmark on Bunker Hill, in downtown Los Angeles. It sits on a large site that features a honorably landscaped plaza. Parking here will put you near Bunker Hill restaurants, hotels, shopping, entertainment and diverse venues. Additionally, there is a farmers market that occurs weekly right near the plaza. Check out Brookfield Properties for more information on Bank of America Plaza!

Reserve your parking now before rates change! Make sure to download the ParkChirp mobile app so that you can easily access your parking pass when you arrive. Available in the App Store or Google Play Store!

The garage is not liable for fire, theft, damage or other loss to the vehicle or its contents, loss of use or any loss due to or attributable to bodily injury or death. Garage clearance is of 6’6″. Tenants driving vehicles that are higher than the posted clearance will NOT be allowed to enter the parking garage.

Location

Facility Address: 333 South Hope Street, Los Angeles, CA, USA

The Bank of America plaza can be accessed via all major freeways, public transportation (Grand Avenue Arts/Bunker Hill station on A and E lines of the Los Angeles Metro Rail system).

ARRIVING AT BANK OF AMERICA PLAZA

110 (Harbor Fwy), North and South

Exit 4th St., up the ramp on the right to Hope St., Left on Hope St., and a Left on 3rd St.

10 (Santa Monica Fwy), East

Take 110 North; Exit 4th St., up the ramp on the right to Hope St., Left on Hope St., and a Left on 3rd St.

10 (San Bernardino Fwy), West

Take 101 North, Exit Grand Ave., and a Right on 3rd St.

101 (Hollywood Fwy), North

Exit Grand Ave., and a Right on 3rd St.

101 (Hollywood Fwy), South

Exit Temple St., straight onto Hope St., Left on 1st St., Right on Grand Ave., and a Right on 3rd St.

60 (Pomona Fwy)

Take 101 North, Exit Grand Ave., and a Right on 3rd St.

5 (Santa Ana Fwy)

Take 101 North, Exit Grand Ave., and a Right on 3rd St.
